metadata.name: UAC Bypass Using MSConfig Token Modification - File
metadata.comment: Detects the pattern of UAC Bypass using a msconfig GUI hack (UACMe 55)

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM file_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('3') AND startswith(lower(file.path), lower('c:\\users\\')) AND endswith(lower(file.path), lower('\\appdata\\local\\temp\\pkgmgr.exe')))

output.summary: Detects the pattern of UAC Bypass using a msconfig GUI hack (UACMe 55)
